)
mapper.select: SELECT MGRNU, '청주시' ||' '|| GU_NAM || ' ' || DONG_NAM || ' ' || RI_NAM || JIBUN AS ADDR, CSS_NAM, PE_NAM, GU_NAM, DONG_NAM, SCH_NAM, MINX, MINY, MAXX, MAXY, XCE, YCE, PE_CDE, GU_CDE, DONG_CDE, CSS_MGRNU, SCH_MGRNU, RI_NAM, RI_CDE, JIBUN, PNU, XGEO, ROD_NAM, ROD_MGRNU, AREA, REG_YMD, UPT_YMD, NAM, CAP, DIS_CAP, GEUPJI, TO_CODE('A111_A','GEUPJI',GEUPJI) AS GEUPJI_NAM, GUBUN, TO_CODE('A111_A','GUBUN',GUBUN) AS GUBUN_NAM, PAID_FREE, TO_CODE('A111_A','PAID_FREE',PAID_FREE) AS PAID_FREE_NAM, TO_CHAR(ESB_YMD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESB_YMD, ETC FROM GT_A111_A WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.update: UPDATE GT_A111_A SET AREA = #{area}, UPT_YMD = SYSDATE, NAM = #{nam}, CAP = #{cap}, DIS_CAP = #{disCap}, GEUPJI = #{geupji}, GUBUN = #{gubun}, PAID_FREE = #{paidFree}, ESB_YMD = #{esbYmd}, ETC = #{etc}, CSS_NAM = #{cssNam}, PE_NAM = #{peNam}, GU_NAM = #{guNam}, DONG_NAM = #{dongNam}, SCH_NAM = #{schNam}, PE_CDE = #{peCde}, GU_CDE = #{guCde}, DONG_CDE = #{dongCde}, CSS_MGRNU = #{cssMgrnu}, SCH_MGRNU = #{schMgrnu}, RI_NAM = #{liNam}, RI_CDE = #{liCde}, JIBUN = #{jibun}, PNU = #{pnu}, ROD_NAM = #{rodNam}, ROD_MGRNU = #{rodMgrnu}, MAXX = #{maxX}, MAXY = #{maxY}, MINX = #{minX}, MINY = #{minY}, XGEO = MDSYS.SDO_GEOMETRY(#{geom},5181) WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS NUM, TEMP.*, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTALROWS FROM ( SELECT MGRNU, MGRNU_IDX, WORK_CDE, TO_CODE('CHG_HISTORY','WORK_CDE',WORK_CDE) AS WORK_CDE_NAM, WORKTM, WORKUSER, WORK_BG FROM GT_A111_A_WORK WHERE MGRNU = #{mgrnu} AND WORK_ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC ) TEMP ORDER BY MGRNU_IDX DESC, MGRNU ASC) TEMP WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{rows} * ( #{page} - 1 ) + 1 AND #{rows}* #{page}
